snippet: The drilling rigs will be added to crucial shale acreage in the United States, based on the company’s expectations for a recovery in the price of crude oil.
abstract: ConocoPhillips tells investors that it plans to add to number of drilling rigs in Eagle Ford shale acreage in South Texas in 2017.
lead_paragraph: The drilling rigs will be added to crucial shale acreage in the United States, based on the company’s expectations for a recovery in the price of crude oil.

headline.main: ConocoPhillips Plans to Add Drilling Rigs in Next 3 Years
